HeroSection.Title: Thola usizo nezinketho zomphakathi ezibalulekile
HeroSection.Subtitle: Hlola uhlu lwezinsiza zomphakathi ezikhethiwe ukuze kuhlangatshezwane nezidingo ezihlukile zomphakathi wakho.
HeroSection.SupportSubtitle: Nguhulumeni bendawo, izinsizakusebenza zesizwe, nezimboni ezizimele.

Blogs.Insight: Faka umbono ukuze uthuthukise ukukhula kwebhizinisi, nathi uhlole izeluleko zokwakha umsebenzi.

Footer.Address: 143 West Street, Sandown, Sandton, Gauteng, INingizimu Afrika

Jobs.Title: Hlola amathuba emisebenzi amasha
Jobs.Subtitle: Thola imisebenzi ehambisana nezinga lakho, iholo, indawo, uhlobo lomsebenzi, njll.

FAQs.Title: Imibuzo Evame Ukubuzwa
FAQs.Subtitle: Uma imibuzo yakho ayiphendulwa lapha, unganqikazi ukuxhumana nethimba lethu lezokusekela ukuze sikusize.
FAQs.LoadError: Yehlulekile ukulayisha Imibuzo Evame Ukubuzwa. Sicela uzame futhi kamuva.

Events.ExploreEvents: Hlola imicimbi emihle eyenzeka endaweni yakho
Events.EventsInfo: Imicimbi ibhajwe ngozakwethu bendawo, izinhlangano, namabhizinisi omphakathi.

PrivacyPolicy.Title: Inqubomgomo Yobumfihlo
PrivacyPolicy.Intro: Sihlonipha ubufihlo benu. Nansi indlela esiphatha ngayo idatha yakho:
PrivacyPolicy.DataCollection: 1. Ukuqoqa Idatha: Siqoqa ulwazi oluhlinzekwayo kanye nedatha yokusetshenziswa.
PrivacyPolicy.Usage: 2. Ukusetshenziswa: Sebenzisa ulwazi lwakho ukuthuthukisa ipulatifomu nezinsizakalo.
PrivacyPolicy.Security: 3. Ukuphepha: Sisebenzisa izinyathelo ukuze sivikele idatha yakho.
PrivacyPolicy.ThirdParties: 4. Abanye: Asabeli idatha yakho ngaphandle kwemvume.
PrivacyPolicy.Updates: 5. Izibuyekezo: Singashintsha le nqubomgomo. Ukusebenzisa kuqhubeka kusho ukuvumelana.
PrivacyPolicy.Contact: Xhumana nathi ku info@sisonke.co.za uma unemibuzo.

Subscribe.Title: Bhalisela i-newsletter yethu
Subscribe.Description: Thola izindaba ezivela emisebenzini emisha, imicimbi, nezinsiza ezithunyelwe nsuku zonke ezinkundleni zethu zomphakathi nasezibhakabhakeni.

Services.Title: Okungenzeka nokutholakala epulatifomini yethu
Services.Subtitle: Noma ufuna usizo, amathuba, nezixhumanisi
Services.CommunityDescription: Xhuma nabantu abafana embonini yakho, wabelane ngezinsiza, futhi ubehlanganyele.
Services.JobsDescription: Izikhungo zethu zikusiza ukufaka izicelo zemisebenzi, uthole ulwazi ngezenzakalo, futhi uthuthukise amakhono akho.
Services.CommunicationDescription: Sisebenzisa amabhlog nomphakathi ukwabelana ngemibono, ubuze imibuzo, futhi uxhumane nabanye.

Hero.HelpMessage: Uma udinga usizo noma unemibuzo, silapha ngawe

ContactPage.FormInstruction: Gcwalisa ifomu bese ithimba lethu lithintana nawe ezinsukwini eziyi-24.
ContactPage.ShortMessage: Umlayezo kumele ube nezimpawu ezingu-10 ubuncane
ContactPage.Name: Igama
ContactPage.Subject: Isihloko

hero.title: Mayelana Nathi
hero.subtitle: E Sisonke, sizigqaja ngokuzibophezela kwethu ekuphakamiseni umphakathi, uxhumano, nokuya phambili ezindaweni zedolobha eNingizimu Afrika.

AboutUs.WhoWeAreDescription: ISisonke iyinsiza edalwe umphakathi exhunywe ezinsizeni, amathuba, kanye nabantu emakhaya aseNingizimu Afrika.
AboutUs.WhatWeDoDescription: Sihlinzeka ngehubhu yedijithali yamakhanda, imicimbi, ama-foramu, nokukhangiswa kwamabhizinisi endawo ukuze sikhuthaze umphakathi wethu.
AboutUs.HowWeHelpDescription: Ngale pulatifomu, sithuthukisa ukuxhumana, ukwabelana ngolwazi, futhi sakha amathuba okukhula nokuthuthukiswa.
AboutUs.CreateSuccessStoriesDescription: Ngokuhlanganisa amalungu omphakathi, amabhizinisi, nezinsiza, sithuthukisa abantu ukuze bafeze izinhloso zabo futhi baphumelele.

job.findJob: Thola umsebenzi wakudala ohlanganiswe kuhlu lwemisebenzi evela ezinkampanini eziqinisekisiwe.
